task.summary: Makes difference between public and admin area Adds different behavior for navigation and title.
Prevents viewing invisible by GET request For public area checks if page or subject (in GET request) is visible before showing content in public area. If it is not the default page is shown.
Adds login for admins Prevents entering admin pages by url without login
